parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) Interface to query the details of all AnalyticDB PostgreSQL Instances in the target region, including Instance IDs.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description:
Database name.

*   Only contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   Must start with a letter.
*   Up to 63 characters in length.
